name: drub
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to beat someone easily, especially in a sports competition: The Yankees drubbed the Red Sox 19-8. It would be unimaginable for Chelsea to drub Roma 7-1.
More examplesFewer examplesThe world champions drubbed the Kiwis 52-0 in Sydney.Corporate America might not have supported the US team if they kept getting drubbed. Getting drubbed in the 1984 presidential election apparently took the ambition to seek office out of him.
